name: rdf_mapper
desc: RDF Mapping Library for Dart

name: BaseRdfLiteralTermDeserializer
desc: Base implementation for literal term deserializers that simplifies the creation of custom deserializers.

name: BaseRdfLiteralTermDeserializer
desc: Creates a new base literal term deserializer.

name: fromRdfTerm
desc: Converts an RDF literal term to a value of type T.

name: fromRdfTerm
desc: Converts an RDF literal term to a value of type T.

name: toRdfTerm
desc: Converts a value to an RDF literal term.

name: BaseRdfLiteralTermSerializer
desc: Base implementation for literal term serializers that simplifies the creation of custom serializers.

name: BaseRdfLiteralTermSerializer
desc: Creates a new base literal term serializer.

name: toRdfTerm
desc: Converts a value to an RDF literal term.

name: DeserializationContext
desc: Context for deserialization operations in the RDF mapping process.

name: fromLiteralTerm
desc: Converts an RDF literal term into a typed Dart value.

name: reader
desc: Creates a reader for fluent access to resource properties.

name: DeserializationException
desc: Exception thrown when errors occur during the RDF deserialization process.

name: DeserializationException
desc: Creates a new deserialization exception with an optional error message.

name: DeserializationService
desc: Core service for RDF deserialization operations.

name: collect
desc: Gets multiple property values and collects them with a custom collector function

name: getMap
desc: Gets a map of property values

name: getValues
desc: Gets a list of property values

name: optional
desc: Gets an optional property value from the RDF graph

name: require
desc: Gets a required property value from the RDF graph

name: Deserializer
desc: Base marker interface for all RDF deserializers.

name: DeserializerDatatypeMismatchException
desc: Exception thrown when a deserializer encounters a datatype in the RDF graph which does not match the expected type.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: DeserializerNotFoundException
desc: Exception thrown when no deserializer is registered for a specific type or RDF type IRI.

name: DeserializerNotFoundException
desc: Creates a new exception for when a deserializer for a Dart type is not found.

name: DeserializerNotFoundException.forTypeIri
desc: Creates a new exception for when a deserializer for an RDF type IRI is not found.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ExtractingIriTermDeserializer
desc: A flexible IRI term deserializer that uses a custom extraction function.

name: ExtractingIriTermDeserializer
desc: Creates a new IRI term deserializer with a custom extraction function.

name: fromRdfTerm
desc: Converts an IRI term to a value.

name: GlobalResourceDeserializer
desc: Deserializes an RDF IRI-identified subject to a Dart object.

name: fromRdfResource
desc: Converts an IRI-identified global resource to an object of type T.

name: GlobalResourceMapper
desc: Bidirectional mapper between Dart objects and RDF subjects with associated triples.

name: GlobalResourceSerializer
desc: Serializes Dart objects to RDF resources with IRI identifiers and associated triples.

name: toRdfResource
desc: Converts a value to an IRI-identified node with associated triples.

name: GraphOperations
desc: Provides direct graph-based operations for RDF object mapping.

name: GraphOperations
desc: Creates a new GraphOperations instance.

name: decodeObject
desc: Deserializes an object of type T from an RDF graph.

name: decodeObjects
desc: Deserializes all subjects of type T from an RDF graph.

name: encodeObject
desc: Serializes an object of type T to an RDF graph.

name: encodeObjects
desc: Serializes a collection of objects of type T to an RDF graph.

name: objectCodec
desc: Creates a codec for serializing and deserializing a single object of type T.

name: objectsCodec
desc: Creates a codec for serializing and deserializing collections of objects of type T.

name: IriFullDeserializer
desc: Standard deserializer that extracts the full IRI string from an IRI term.

name: fromRdfTerm
desc: Converts an IRI term to its full string representation.

name: IriFullSerializer
desc: Standard serializer that converts a string to an IRI term.

name: toRdfTerm
desc: Converts a string to an IRI term.

name: IriIdSerializer
desc: Serializer that converts a local identifier to a complete IRI term.

name: IriIdSerializer
desc: Creates a new IRI ID serializer with the specified expansion function.

name: toRdfTerm
desc: Converts a local identifier to an IRI term.

name: IriTermDeserializer
desc: Deserializes an RDF IRI term to a Dart object.

name: fromRdfTerm
desc: Converts an IRI term to a value.

name: IriTermMapper
desc: Bidirectional mapper between Dart objects and RDF IRI terms.

name: IriTermSerializer
desc: Serializes a Dart object to an RDF IRI term.

name: toRdfTerm
desc: Converts a value to an IRI term.

name: LiteralTermDeserializer
desc: Deserializes an RDF literal term to a Dart object.

name: fromRdfTerm
desc: Converts a literal term to a value.

name: LiteralTermMapper
desc: Bidirectional mapper between Dart objects and RDF literal terms.

name: LiteralTermSerializer
desc: Serializes a Dart object to an RDF literal term.

name: toRdfTerm
desc: Converts a value to a literal term.

name: LocalResourceDeserializer
desc: Deserializes an RDF local resource to a Dart object.

name: fromRdfResource
desc: Converts a local resource to a value.

name: LocalResourceMapper
desc: Bidirectional mapper between Dart objects and RDF local resources.

name: LocalResourceSerializer
desc: Serializes Dart objects to RDF blank nodes with associated triples.

name: toRdfResource
desc: Converts a value to a blank node with associated triples.

name: Mapper
desc: Base marker interface for bidirectional RDF mappers.

name: Namespace
desc: Utility class for managing RDF namespaces and creating IRI terms.

name: Namespace
desc: Creates a new namespace with the specified base IRI.

name: call
desc: Creates an IRI term by combining the namespace base with a local name.

name: hashCode
desc: Returns a hash code for this namespace.

name: operator ==
desc: Checks if this namespace is equal to another object.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this namespace.

name: uri
desc: Returns the base IRI of this namespace.

name: NoDeserializableSubjectsException
desc: Exception thrown when no deserializable subjects of the required type are found.

name: PropertyValueNotFoundException
desc: Exception thrown when a required property value is not found in the RDF graph

name: PropertyValueNotFoundException
desc: Creates a new PropertyValueNotFoundException

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RdfMapper
desc: Central facade for the RDF Mapper library, providing access to object mapping and registry operations.

name: RdfMapper
desc: Creates an RDF Mapper facade with custom components.

name: RdfMapper.withDefaultRegistry
desc: Creates an RDF Mapper facade with a default registry and standard mappers.

name: RdfMapper.withMappers
desc: Creates an RDF Mapper facade with a custom-configured registry.

name: decodeObject
desc: Deserializes an object of type T from an RDF string representation.

name: decodeObjects
desc: Deserializes all subjects from an RDF string into a list of objects.

name: encodeObject
desc: Serializes a Dart object or collection to an RDF string representation.

name: encodeObjects
desc: Serializes a collection of Dart objects to an RDF string representation.

name: graph
desc: Access to graph-based operations.

name: objectCodec
desc: Returns a codec for converting between objects of type T and RDF strings.

name: objectsCodec
desc: Returns a codec for handling collections of type T and RDF strings.

name: registerMapper
desc: Registers a mapper for bidirectional conversion between Dart objects and RDF.

name: registry
desc: Access to the underlying registry for custom mapper registration.

name: RdfMapperCodec
desc: Base class for RDF mapping codecs that convert between Dart objects and RDF graphs.

name: decode
desc: Converts an RDF graph to a Dart object of type T.

name: decoder
desc: Returns the decoder of this, converting from T to S.

name: encode
desc: Converts a Dart object of type T to an RDF graph.

name: encoder
desc: Returns the encoder from S to T.

name: RdfMapperDecoder
desc: Decoder component of the RDF mapper codec system.

name: convert
desc: Converts an RDF graph to an object of type T.

name: RdfMapperEncoder
desc: Encoder component of the RDF mapper codec system.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: RdfMapperRegistry
desc: Central registry for RDF mappers that handles type-to-mapper associations.

name: RdfMapperRegistry
desc: Creates a new RDF mapper registry with standard mappers pre-registered.

name: clone
desc: Returns a deep copy of this registry, including all registered mappers.

name: getIriTermDeserializer
desc: Gets the deserializer for a specific type.

name: getIriTermSerializerByType
desc: Gets a IRI serializer by runtime type rather than generic type parameter.

name: getLiteralTermSerializerByType
desc: Gets a literal serializer by runtime type rather than generic type parameter.

name: getResourceSerializerByType
desc: Gets a subject serializer by runtime type rather than generic type parameter.

name: hasIriTermDeserializerFor
desc: Checks if a mapper exists for a type.

name: registerDeserializer
desc: Registers a deserializer with the appropriate registry based on its type.

name: registerMapper
desc: Registers a mapper with all appropriate registries based on its implemented interfaces.

name: registerSerializer
desc: Registers a serializer with the appropriate registry based on its type.

name: RdfMapperService
desc: Core service for mapping between Dart objects and RDF representations.

name: RdfMapperService
desc: Creates a new RDF mapper service.

name: deserialize
desc: Deserializes the single subject of type T from an RDF graph.

name: deserializeAll
desc: Deserializes a list of objects from all subjects in an RDF graph.

name: deserializeBySubject
desc: Deserializes an object of type T from an RDF graph, using a specific subject.

name: registry
desc: Access to the underlying registry for registering custom mappers.

name: serialize
desc: Serializes an object of type T to an RDF graph.

name: serializeList
desc: Serializes a list of objects to a combined RDF graph.

name: RdfMappingException
desc: Base exception class for all RDF mapping related errors.

name: RdfMappingException
desc: Creates a new RDF mapping exception with an optional error message.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RdfObjectCodec
desc: A codec for converting between Dart objects and RDF graphs.

name: RdfObjectCodec
desc: Creates a new object codec with the given service.

name: RdfObjectCodec.forMappers
desc: Creates a new codec from an optional RdfMapper instance or a register function.

name: decode
desc: Decodes an RDF graph to a Dart object.

name: decoder
desc: Returns the decoder of this, converting from T to S.

name: encode
desc: Encodes a Dart object to an RDF graph.

name: encoder
desc: Returns the encoder from S to T.

name: RdfObjectDecoder
desc: Decoder for converting RDF graphs to Dart objects.

name: RdfObjectDecoder
desc: Creates a new decoder with the given mapper service and optional register function.

name: convert
desc: Converts an RDF graph to a Dart object.

name: RdfObjectEncoder
desc: Encoder for converting Dart objects to RDF graphs.

name: RdfObjectEncoder
desc: Creates a new encoder with the given mapper service and optional register function.

name: convert
desc: Converts a Dart object to an RDF graph.

name: decode
desc: Decodes encoded data.

name: decoder
desc: Returns the decoder of this, converting from T to S.

name: encode
desc: Encodes input.

name: encoder
desc: Returns the encoder from S to T.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: RdfObjectsCodec
desc: A codec for converting between collections of Dart objects and RDF graphs.

name: RdfObjectsCodec
desc: Creates a new object codec with the given service.

name: decode
desc: Decodes an RDF graph to a collection of Dart objects.

name: decoder
desc: Returns the decoder component of this codec.

name: encode
desc: Encodes a collection of Dart objects to an RDF graph.

name: encoder
desc: Returns the encoder component of this codec.

name: RdfObjectsDecoder
desc: Decoder for converting RDF graphs to Dart objects.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: RdfObjectsEncoder
desc: Encoder for converting Dart objects to RDF graphs.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: decode
desc: Decodes encoded data.

name: decoder
desc: Returns the decoder of this, converting from T to S.

name: encode
desc: Encodes input.

name: encoder
desc: Returns the encoder from S to T.

name: RdfObjectsStringDecoder
desc: Decoder for converting RDF strings to objects.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: RdfObjectsStringEncoder
desc: Encoder for converting objects to RDF strings.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: ResourceBuilder
desc: Builder for fluent RDF resource serialization.

name: ResourceBuilder
desc: Creates a new ResourceBuilder for the fluent API.

name: addMap
desc: Adds a map of key-value pairs as child resources.

name: build
desc: Builds the resource and returns the subject and list of triples.

name: when
desc: Conditionally applies a transformation to this builder.

name: ResourceDeserializer
desc: Base class for deserializers that convert RDF subjects with associated triples to Dart objects.

name: typeIri
desc: The IRI of the RDF type this deserializer can handle.

name: ResourceReader
desc: Reader for fluent RDF resource deserialization.

name: ResourceReader
desc: Creates a new ResourceReader for the fluent API.

name: collect
desc: Gets multiple property values and processes them with a custom collector function.

name: getMap
desc: Gets multiple property values as a map.

name: getValues
desc: Gets multiple property values as an iterable.

name: optional
desc: Gets an optional property value from the RDF graph.

name: require
desc: Gets a required property value from the RDF graph.

name: ResourceSerializer
desc: Base class for serializers that convert objects to RDF nodes (subjects with triples).

name: toRdfResource
desc: Converts a Dart object to an RDF node (subject and associated triples).

name: typeIri
desc: The IRI of the type of the subject.

name: SerializationContext
desc: Core interface for serializing Dart objects to RDF.

name: resourceBuilder
desc: Creates a ResourceBuilder for constructing RDF resources.

name: toLiteralTerm
desc: Converts a Dart value to an RDF literal term.

name: SerializationException
desc: Exception thrown when errors occur during the RDF serialization process.

name: SerializationException
desc: Creates a new serialization exception with an optional error message.

name: SerializationService
desc: Core service for RDF serialization operations.

name: resource
desc: Serializes an object to a RDF resource.

name: valueMap
desc: Creates triples for a map of child nodes.

name: Serializer
desc: Base marker interface for all RDF serializers.

name: SerializerNotFoundException
desc: Exception thrown when no serializer is registered for a specific Dart type.

name: SerializerNotFoundException
desc: Creates a new exception for when a serializer for a Dart type is not found.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: fromRdfTerm
desc: Converts an RDF literal term to a value of type T.

name: TermDeserializer
desc: Base class for deserializers that convert RDF terms to Dart objects.

name: TermSerializer
desc:
Groups those serializers that serialize a Dart object to an RDF term
(i.e. IriTerm or LiteralTerm) and not to a list of Triples.

name: TooManyDeserializableSubjectsException
desc: Exception thrown when multiple deserializable subjects are found but only one is expected.

name: TooManyPropertyValuesException
desc: Exception thrown when multiple values are found for a single-valued property.

name: TooManyPropertyValuesException
desc: Creates a new exception for when too many values are found for a property.

name: objects
desc: The list of object values found for the property

name: predicate
desc: The predicate representing the property

name: subject
desc: The RDF subject where the property was found

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.
